name: AdvancedNodeJS-Express
description: A template engine enables you to use static tmplates files(pug) in your app.  At runtime, the template engine replaces variables in a template file with actual values which can be supplied by your server.  Then it transforms the template into a static HTML file that is sent to te client.  This approach makes it easier to design an HTML page and allows for displaying variables on the page without needing to make an API call from the client.
author: Mark Nguyen
